title: Introducing: Goldilox – Morning
body:
Some pretty vibey pop here from Canadian singer Goldilox on her official debut track, Morning.

With layer upon layer building throughout the track, it’s decisively slick and glowingly ambitious. Lifted from an EP out later this year, it’s a hugely exciting first outing. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
